title: As an Ayurvedic or Traditional Chinese Medicine doctor what would you recommend to do to not develop Covid-19?
description: Answer (1 of 4): The truth is this virus is like many corona viruses we have faced before. Most of the people that are exposed to it will never develop an illness, cold or flu like symptoms. Some people with compromised immune systems will fall ill and generally it is the state of their overall h...
